short_description: Observations That Are Calculated From Other Obersvations
description: This segment contains information about quantities that are derived from one or more other quantities or direct observations by mathematical or logical means

1.name: Segment Type Id
1.description: the string OM6 - identifies a record as an observation that is derived or calculated from one or more other observations

2.name: Sequence Number - Test/ Observation Master File
2.description: the same value as the sequence number of the associated OM1 segment

3.name: Derivation Rule
3.description: in the case of patient variables that are derived from one or more other patient variables (e.g., creatinine clearance, ideal weight, maximum daily temperature, average glucose, framingham risk), this field contains the rules for deriving the value of this variable (i.e., nature code C, as given in OM1-19-nature of test/observation). These can be described in terms of humanly understandable formulas or descriptions
